original_text: The Lord said to his people, ‘Stand at the place where the roads cross, and look carefully. Ask where the ways of your ancestors are. 6: The ‘old ways’ were the laws that Moses had given to God's people. See Deuteronomy 32:7. Find the good way, and go along that way. Then you will live in peace.’ But the people said, ‘No, we will not go that way. ’ The Lord said to his people, ‘Stand at the place where the roads cross, and look carefully. Ask where the ways of your ancestors are. 6: The ‘old ways’ were the laws that Moses had given to God's people. See Deuteronomy 32:7. Find the good way, and go along that way. Then you will live in peace.’ But the people said, ‘No, we will not go that way. ’ The Lord said to his people,
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 너희는 길에 서서 보며 옛적 길 곧 선한 길이 어디인지 알아보고 그리로 가라 너희 심령이 평강을 얻으리라 하나 그들의 대답이 우리는 그리로 가지 않겠노라 하였으며

sentences.original_text: The Lord said to his people
Stand at the place where the roads cross
and look carefully
Ask where the ways of your ancestors are
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 조상들이 걸어간 길이 어디인지 물어보라

sentences.original_text: The 'old ways' were the laws
that Moses had given to God's people
Find the good way
and go along that way
Then you will live in peace
But the people said
No, we will not go that way
sentences.korean_translation: 아니요, 우리는 그 길로 가지 않겠습니다
